name: Custard Fall
description:
How to play

<< Mind the Custard as it minds you... >>

A warning: Beware of the custard! At midday, it crawls to the bottom levels, but at night it rises to the top of the mountains.

We recommend playing this game with the controller!

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - (optional) Look Around

East Button / Left-Trigger - Inhale

Left/Right Bumper - Dash (use to get over the edge)

Keyboard & Mouse Controls:

Left Click or Ctrl/Shift - Inhale

Right Click or F Key - Grappling Hook

Space Key - Dash

Press I Button - Toggle inventory ON/OFF

Esc - Pause
